summary: Frontend testing completed for navigation changes. All requested features verified: 1) Navigation merged with hero (same #3A4E63 blue background), 2) Active state indicators working on all nav items (white/transparent highlight), 3) 'About' removed from top navigation, 4) 'About Us' link still present in footer, 5) Workspace Overview page has full-color hero, 6) All navigation links work correctly.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Navigation changes successfully implemented. Navigation is now merged with hero section using #3A4E63 blue background. Active state shows bg-white/20 highlight on current page. About link removed from top nav but still in footer.

navigation_merged_with_hero.description: Navigation has same #3A4E63 blue background as hero

active_state_indicators.description: Nav items show white highlight (bg-white/20) when on that page

about_in_footer.description: 'About Us' link still present in footer under Company section

workspace_overview_hero.description: Workspace Overview page has full-color #3A4E63 hero section

navigation_links_work.description: All navigation links navigate to correct pages

login_signup_buttons.description: Login and Sign Up buttons visible and functional

SharedNavigation.jsx.isActive_function: Correctly detects current path using useLocation()
SharedNavigation.jsx.navLinks_array: Contains 6 items: Home, Workspace, Solutions, Pricing, Intelligence, Contact (About removed)
SharedNavigation.jsx.active_styling: bg-white/20 text-white for active, text-white/80 hover:text-white hover:bg-white/10 for inactive

WorkspaceOverview.jsx.hero_section: Has bg-[#3A4E63] class for full-color hero

HomeNew.jsx.footer_about_link: Line 812 - About Us link present in footer
